nodes.bodyText:
Per IBM style, variable should precede descriptor
In this message, does {0} represent the response itself or the API?

per IBM style, it should read
The {0} response from the user API cannot be processed.
However, if the API response is expected to be a long string or similar, making the message illegible, it can be
The following response from the user API cannot be processed: {0}
response can be very long and some times with an error exception included. I think it is better to do "The following response ........"
